alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 7:58AM PST until December 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 24 inches, heaviest above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County above 4000 feet. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel conditions are expected to be difficult. Expect snow and ice covered roads and greatly reduced visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
